top_comments.comment: Please do a Tech Analysis on PC

comments_since_last_sample.body: I don't get it the 30 fps 4k plays like slomo but looks amazing and the 60 fps 1080p looks horrible and blurry. They should add at least a 1440p 60 fps mode just like Spiderman Miles Morales did
I've heard the gameplay is good and the story and characters are charming. But I might wait to catch this after it receives some fixes, XSX should be able to play in quality at 60fps.
